mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HNYC_TRADEMARK_INFO (trademark_code, trademark_name, f_isinside, producing_area, maker, f_senior, f_stress, f_trademark_hundreds, province, status) VALUES ( #{trademark_code ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trademark_name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{f_isinside ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{producing_area ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maker ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{f_senior ,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{f_stress ,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{f_trademark_hundreds ,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{province ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status ,jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HNYC_TRADEMARK_INFO SET trademark_name = #{trademark_name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_isinside = #{f_isinside ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, producing_area = #{producing_area ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maker = #{maker ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_senior = #{f_senior ,jdbcType=CHAR}, f_stress = #{f_stress ,jdbcType=CHAR}, f_trademark_hundreds = #{f_trademark_hundreds ,jdbcType=CHAR}, province = #{province ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status ,jdbcType=CHAR} WHERE trademark_code = #{trademark_code ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
